title: [Badlands, Gully]
description: The gully abruptly meets a solid rock cliff face.  The cliff face slants inward a bit, and errant drops of water fall from the overhang.  The shadowy area under the cliff is slick with a thin layer of ice.

The gully abruptly meets a solid rock cliff face.  The cliff face slants inward a bit, and errant drops of water fall from the overhang.  The area under the cliff is slick with a thin layer of ice which shines coldly in the moonlight.
